a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: How much global land is used as pasture for livestock?
The extent of global pasture used for livestock grazing. It does not include cropland used to grow animal feed. This
is shown for three sources, which use different methods of estimation.
Source: Taylor & Rising (2021); Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nation; Ellis et al. (2020)
